price: 15. Jinkana wuxuu ka abuuray olol dab (halka malaa’igta uu ka abuuray nuur ifiya).
arabic: وَخَلَقَ ٱلۡجَآنَّ مِن مَّارِجٖ مِّن نَّارٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wakhalaqa al-jāna min mārijin min nārin
